abstract: Pitchfork, the online music magazine that runs the Pitchfork Music Festival in Chicago, has announced it will put on a festival in New York City next February in conjunction with the Bowery Presents.
snippet: Pitchfork, the online music magazine that runs the Pitchfork Music Festival in Chicago, has announced it will put on a festival in New York City next February in conjunction with the Bowery Presents.

headline.print_headline: A New Kind of Pitchfork Coming to New York
